segments.source_content:
[Hermes](https://hermesengine.dev) is an open-source JavaScript engine optimized for React Native. For many apps, using Hermes will result in improved start-up time, decreased memory usage, and smaller app size when compared to JavaScriptCore.
Hermes is used by default by React Native and no additional configuration is required to enable it.

translations.zh-hant:
[Hermes](https://hermesengine.dev) 是一個專為 React Native 優化的開源 JavaScript 引擎。對多數應用而言，相較於 JavaScriptCore，使用 Hermes 能帶來更快的啟動時間、更低的記憶體使用量以及更小的應用體積。
React Native 預設已整合 Hermes，無需額外配置即可啟用。

segments.source_content: ## Bundled Hermes

translations.zh-hant: ## 內建版 Hermes

segments.source_content:
React Native comes with a **bundled version** of Hermes.
We are building a version of Hermes for you whenever we release a new version of React Native. This will make sure you're consuming a version of Hermes which is fully compatible with the version of React Native you're using.

translations.zh-hant:
React Native 附帶 **內建版本** 的 Hermes。
每當我們發布新版本 React Native 時，都會為您構建對應的 Hermes 版本。這確保您使用的 Hermes 版本與當前 React Native 版本完全相容。

segments.source_content:
This change is fully transparent to users of React Native. You can still disable Hermes using the command described in this page.
You can [read more about the technical implementation on this page](/architecture/bundled-hermes).

translations.zh-hant:
此變更對 React Native 使用者完全透明。您仍可透過本頁面描述的指令停用 Hermes。
您可[在此頁面深入瞭解技術實現細節](/architecture/bundled-hermes)。

segments.source_content: ## Confirming Hermes is in use

translations.zh-hant: ## 確認 Hermes 已啟用

segments.source_content: If you've recently created a new app from scratch, you should see if Hermes is enabled in the welcome view:

translations.zh-hant: 若您近期從零建立新應用，應能在歡迎畫面中確認 Hermes 是否啟用：

segments.source_content: ![Where to find JS engine status in AwesomeProject](/docs/assets/HermesApp.jpg)

translations.zh-hant: ![在 AwesomeProject 中查看 JS 引擎狀態的位置](/docs/assets/HermesApp.jpg)

segments.source_content: A `HermesInternal` global variable will be available in JavaScript that can be used to verify that Hermes is in use:

translations.zh-hant: JavaScript 中會存在一個全域變數 `HermesInternal`，可用於驗證 Hermes 是否運作中：
@@untranslatable_placeholder_cb57d798

segments.source_content:
:::caution
If you are using a non-standard way of loading the JS bundle, it is possible that the `HermesInternal` variable is available but you aren't using the highly optimised pre-compiled bytecode.
Confirm that you are using the `.hbc` file and also benchmark the before/after as detailed below.
:::

translations.zh-hant:
:::caution
若您使用非標準方式載入 JS 套件包，可能出現 `HermesInternal` 變數存在但未使用高效能預編譯位元組碼的情況。
請確認您使用的是 `.hbc` 檔案，並參照下文進行前後效能比對。
:::

segments.source_content: This will compile JavaScript to Hermes Bytecode during build time which will improve your app's startup speed on device.

translations.zh-hant: 此指令將在建置階段把 JavaScript 編譯為 Hermes 位元組碼，從而提升應用在裝置上的啟動速度。

segments.source_content: ## Switching back to JavaScriptCore

translations.zh-hant: ## 切換回 JavaScriptCore

segments.source_content: React Native also supports using JavaScriptCore as the [JavaScript engine](javascript-environment). Follow these instructions to opt-out of Hermes.

translations.zh-hant: React Native 也支援使用 JavaScriptCore 作為 [JavaScript 引擎](javascript-environment)。請遵循以下指示停用 Hermes。

segments.source_content: ### Android

translations.zh-hant: ### Android

segments.source_content: Edit your `android/gradle.properties` file and flip `hermesEnabled` back to false:

translations.zh-hant: 編輯 `android/gradle.properties` 檔案，將 `hermesEnabled` 改回 false：

segments.source_content:
```diff
# Use this property to enable or disable the Hermes JS engine.
# If set to false, you will be using JSC instead.
hermesEnabled=false
```

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_890e01bc

segments.source_content: ### iOS

translations.zh-hant: ### iOS

segments.source_content: Edit your `ios/Podfile` file and make the change illustrated below:

translations.zh-hant: 編輯 `ios/Podfile` 檔案並進行如下變更：

segments.source_content:
```diff
   use_react_native!(
     :path => config[:reactNativePath],
+    :hermes_enabled => false,
     # An absolute path to your application root.
     :app_path => "#{Pod::Config.instance.installation_root}/.."
   )
```
